sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-form
    :model="formState"
    v-bind="layout"
    name="nest-messages"
    :validate-messages="validateMessages"
    @finish="onFinish"
  >




    <a-form-item :name="['user', 'name']" label="选择时间" :rules="[{ required: true }]">
      <!-- <a-input v-model:value="formState.user.name" /> -->
<!-- <a-input v-model:value="formState.user.name" /> -->

  <a-space direction="vertical" :size="12">
    <!-- <a-date-picker show-time placeholder="Select Time" @change="onChange" @ok="onOk" /> -->
    <a-range-picker
      :show-time="{ format: 'HH:mm' }"
      format="YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm"
      :placeholder="['Start Time', 'End Time']"
      @change="onRangeChange"
      @ok="onRangeOk"
    />
  </a-space>

</a-form-item>






    <a-form-item :name="['user', 'email']" label="假期种类" :rules="[{ type: 'email' }]">
      <a-input v-model:value="formState.user.email" />
    </a-form-item>




    <a-form-item :name="['user', 'age']" label="Age" :rules="[{ type: 'number', min: 0, max: 99 }]">
      <a-input-number v-model:value="formState.user.age" />
    </a-form-item>
    <a-form-item :name="['user', 'website']" label="Website">
      <a-input v-model:value="formState.user.website" />
    </a-form-item>
    <a-form-item :name="['user', 'introduction']" label="Introduction">
      <a-textarea v-model:value="formState.user.introduction" />
    </a-form-item>
    <a-form-item :wrapper-col="{ ...layout.wrapperCol, offset: 8 }">
      <a-button type="primary" html-type="submit">Submit</a-button>
    </a-form-item>
  </a-form>
</template>
<script>
import { defineComponent, reactive } from 'vue';
export default defineComponent({
  setup() {
    const layout = {
      labelCol: {
        span: 8,
      },
      wrapperCol: {
        span: 16,
      },
    };
    const validateMessages = {
      required: '${label} is required!',
      types: {
        email: '${label} is not a valid email!',
        number: '${label} is not a valid number!',
      },
      number: {
        range: '${label} must be between ${min} and ${max}',
      },
    };
    const formState = reactive({
      user: {
        name: '',
        age: undefined,
        email: '',
        website: '',
        introduction: '',
      },
    });

    const onFinish = values => {
      console.log('Success:', values);
    };

    const onChange = (value, dateString) => {
      console.log('Selected Time: ', value);
      console.log('Formatted Selected Time: ', dateString);
    };

    const onOk = value => {
      console.log('onOk: ', value);
    };

    const onRangeChange = (value, dateString) => {
      console.log('Selected Time: ', value);
      console.log('Formatted Selected Time: ', dateString);
    };

    const onRangeOk = value => {
      console.log('onOk: ', value);
    };

    return {
      formState,
      onFinish,
      layout,
      validateMessages,
    //    onChange,
    //   onOk,
      onRangeChange,
      onRangeOk,
    };
  },

});
</script>
